source_objects.title: Media
source_objects.description: Master new forms of publishing from e-books to kindle publishing or writing blogs.

items.title: The Complete Podcasting Course with Brendan Davis
items.headline: Features a detailed CASE STUDY of an actual show being recorded, edited, & published in (almost) real time!
objectives_summary: Create a smart, well thought-out, and technically solid podcast from scratch.
Those with little technical or creative experience can use the course as a one-stop resource to learn or review all of the essential concepts and terminology needed to excel.
Savvy podcasters will learn new tricks and gain insights to make their work better, regardless of current experience.

items.title: Turbocharge your life and career with the power of story.
items.headline: Learn how to tell audio stories so compelling that your audience will be entranced.
objectives_summary: Use the power of story to create a compelling podcast that listeners will love.

items.title: Master Self-Editing & Story Revision

items.headline: A Helpful Guide to Preparing, Revising, and Polishing Your Self-Published Books and Novels
objectives_summary: Write and edit superior manuscripts for publication and sale
Know how to recognize and fix common authorial errors
Have a greater understanding of how good fiction works

items.title: Kindle Publishing
items.headline: Kindle Publishing on Amazon - How to publish a book through Kindle Direct Publishing and whether to enrol in KDP Select
objectives_summary: Learn how to dissect the elements that make up a bestselling book in your niche or genre
Learn how to choose the best two categories for your book
Learn how to discover the keyword phrases that readers are searching for in your niche or genre

items.title: Paperback Publishing on Amazon KDP ( Formerly CreateSpace )
items.headline: A Step-By-Step Guide to Self-Publishing a Paperback Book on Amazon Kindle Direct Publishing Print
objectives_summary: DISCOVER the 5 compelling reasons for publishing paperback books
UNDERSTAND the different elements that make-up a paperback book
LEARN how to input the details of your paperback book into Amazon KDP

items.title: How to Create Bestselling Kindle Ebook Covers - Series 1
items.headline: A step-by-step Ebook Covers Design guide for creating beautiful Kindle book covers Includes 6 customizable templates!
objectives_summary: Includes easy to use templates
No design experience necessary
Eliminate graphic designer costs

items.title: Bitcoin - How to receive FREE Bitcoin and Cryptocurrencies
items.headline: Everything that you need to know to get your started with Bitcoin and Cryptocurrencies
objectives_summary: You will learn everything that you need to know about the exciting world of Bitcoin and Cryptocurrencies

items.title: Zoom H6 Audio Recording Essentials
items.headline: Beginning to Advanced, this course presents the essentials of the Zoom H6 recorder to get you recording your audio fast!
objectives_summary: Recording and playback essentials of the Zoom H6 Handy Recorder.
You will gain confidence in the use of the Zoom H6 recorder and its capabilities.

items.title: Create That EBook
items.headline: Quick step by step guide to creating ePub files and iBook Author files. Get that eBook created quickly!
objectives_summary: Create multimedia ePub files
Create multimedia iBooks files

items.title: Create an Awesome Book Trailer for Your Fiction Title
items.headline: It's pretty much a fact most Book Trailers are dreadful. Avoid this fate and create an awesome one.
objectives_summary: The goal of this course to to provide the knowledge and the tools to all allow you to create a dynamic video marketing tool
The objective of the course is to distill the elements that work in a book trailer and apply them to your story.
